title: Working at Riot
body:
Hey I posted on reddit but I also wanted to post on here. 

Hey idk if any rioters will see this but I want to say first off I love this game, I've only been playing for a season but it has become my favorite past time and I spend so much time researching and learning how to play better so thank you guys for making such an awesome game. Not everyone is perfect and while there will always be "op champs" and flamers that blame everything on you guys because they can't climb I think you guys are doing a great job! 

Secondly I want to be a part of making this game better, with the amount of time I spend on this game and how much I think about it it would be amazing to be able to resolve my work life around it as well. The problem is I don't have a college degree or any technical backgrounds in computers. What I do have is communication skills, creative thinking, critical thinking, and I am very good at writing when I sit down and try. So I guess my question would be, is there any sort of job at riot that would allow me to be a part of this great game from the inside or am I out of luck and just get to enjoy the game as much as I can with the little amount of time I have to play? I know it's a long shot but I just thought I would ask anyways! 

Thanks!
